O

org.editorconfig.core - package org.editorconfig.core
Provides the Java API for accessing EditorConfig Core (For the purpose and usage of EditorConfig, see EditorConfig homepage for details).

P

ParsingException - Exception in org.editorconfig.core
Exception throwed by EditorConfig.getProperties() if an EditorConfig file could not be parsed
PathException - Exception in org.editorconfig.core
Exception throwed by EditorConfig.getProperties() if an invalid file path is specified

V

VersionException - Exception in org.editorconfig.core
Exception throwed by EditorConfig.getProperties() if an invalid version number is specified
